info.task: read information about collapsed accordion header
info.title: Read information about a collapsed accordion header

setupScript.name: setFocusOnAndCollapseFirstAccordionHeader
setupScript.description: collapses and sets focus on the 'Personal Information' accordion header

user: With focus on the 'Personal Information' accordion header, read information about the accordion header.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Personal Information' accordion header, read information about the accordion header.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.
